product_name: WTB Speed She Comp Saddle - Women's
long_description: The Speed She Comp from Wilderness Trail Bikes is a female-specific saddle featuring an ergonomic shape, elegant curves and low-profile stitching. Flex-Tuned(TM) shell boasts a mix of comfortable flex and firm efficiency; it's not too hard and it's not too soft. Love Channel(R) protects body from unwanted pressure; central depression offers soft-tissue relief without sacrificing structural integrity. Pressure relief zones in sensitive areas provide long-term comfort so you can stay in the saddle longer; features women-specific gel padding. Corners and sides are reinforced to protect from rips and tears.
short_description: The Speed She Comp from Wilderness Trail Bikes is a female-specific saddle featuring an ergonomic shape, elegant curves and low-profile stitching.
